title: Any champs with the capability to play any role?
body: Im currently looking for 3 champs with a great capability to be able to play any role. I feel this will not only help me learn more roles giving me better understanding of how my teammates play thier lane but having multiple options to choose from and be confident with, 1 or 2 of the said champs are banned. Off the top of my head i think Galio, Zilean and orianna are possible candidates. Thoughts???

replies.body:
{{champion:133}}

Only role I haven't played her in is Jungle, but I suck at jungle. She can be played Jungle, if you know how to jungle.

Teemo can literally play any role. I've seen him Mid, Top, Jg, ADC, APC, and Support.

Annie can Mid, Top, and Support fairly well. Jungle is a bit troll but possible in low elo if you're good. APC can be done too.

Fiddlesticks can play Top, Mid, Jungle, and Support.

Twisted Fate can Top, Mid, Jungle, APC, and Support (I have seen stun bot TF).

Taliyah can Mid, Top, Support, and Jungle.

There are most likely more, but these are all that I can think of from the top of my head.
I'd add Lulu to the list also. Nidalee is an old school pick although her support is a little bit lacking but has a couple of paths to be played with.

Trying to find multiple champions to play EVERY role is a bit too difficult, as most champions are designed to only fit into a maximum of 2 roles. Taking them into off roles would mean they would be significantly weaker than whoever you are up against. Unfortunately if you want to have a better understanding of every role you're going to have to learn a few more then 3 champions.
